GetReady: RE-MED empowers you to report construction trash effortlessly. Let's ensure our citystays clean and beautiful together.
With RE-MED, reporting construction: With RE-MED, reporting construction trash is a breeze. Snap a photo, add a few details, and hit submit. Our process ensures your report reaches us, making cleanup a priority.
Congratulations: Congratulations! By using RE-MED, you're actively contributing to a cleaner environment and safer streets.
permissions_request_failed: we failed accessing your location, please try again.
permissions_explanation: We access to your camera and images files so we can upload them to our ai to get anaylised and reported.
Location permission is required to conti: Location permission is required to continue.
whyweuse: Allowing location access helps us accurately locate the reported trash, making cleanup more efficient.
NeededLocal: Location access is required to identify the reported trash location.
cameraPermissionDenied: You need to allow camera functionality to use the camera and take pictures or upload it.
THE RE-MED PROJECT: The RE-MED project has been supported by funding from the European Union ENI CBC MED Program (Education Research Technological Development and Innovation) under study agreement N°28-1682

AllowLocationText: Allowing location access helps us identify the exact location of the reported trash, making cleanup more efficient.

menuItems.checkPoints: Check all the current RE-MED points

profileScreen.subject: Subject
profileScreen.privacyPolicy: At REMED, we are committed to serving you better. To do this, we collect certain data to help us track your reports and ensure they are assigned for prompt collection. Your data benefits you by enabling us to monitor and address your reports quickly, assign them to the right team members for faster response times, improve our services by anticipating your needs, and offer personalized support. Your privacy is important to us, and the data we collect is used solely for these purposes to enhance your experience with REMED.
profileScreen.confirmUpdate: Do you really want to update those informations?
profileScreen.Q3: Do I have to create an account?
profileScreen.Q4: How many languages does this application support?
profileScreen.Q5: Is the app free to use?
profileScreen.A1: This app allows users to take pictures or upload images of locations where construction waste needs to be collected.
profileScreen.A2: To use the app, create an account with your email, then choose a username and password. After successfully signing up, log in to your account with your username and password.
profileScreen.A3: Yes, creating an account is necessary to use ourapplication.
profileScreen.A4: Our application supports English, Arabic, French, and Italian.
profileScreen.A5: Yes, the app is free to download and use.
